original_text: Other seeds fell on soil with rocks in it. This is like some people who hear God's message. These people are happy to believe it for a time.
korean_text: 돌밭에 뿌려졌다는 것은 말씀을 듣고 즉시 기쁨으로 받되

sentences.original_text: Other seeds fell on soil with rocks in it.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 씨앗들은 돌이 많은 땅에 떨어졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: to believe it for a time.
